scripts.start-example-web: yarn build-web && yarn build-devtools && rm -rf ./examples/web/cdn/hcl-sdk-web-ui && cp -R ./packages/hcl-sdk-web-ui/dist/hcl-sdk ./examples/web/cdn/hcl-sdk-web-ui && rm -rf ./examples/web/cdn/hcl-sdk-tools && cp -R ./packages/hcl-sdk-web-devtools/dist/devtools ./examples/web/cdn/hcl-sdk-tools && npx serve ./examples/web/cdn
scripts.build-example-web: yarn build-web && yarn build-devtools && rm -rf ./examples/web/cdn/hcl-sdk-web-ui && cp -R ./packages/hcl-sdk-web-ui/dist/hcl-sdk ./examples/web/cdn/hcl-sdk-web-ui && rm -rf ./examples/web/cdn/hcl-sdk-tools && cp -R ./packages/hcl-sdk-web-devtools/dist/devtools ./examples/web/cdn/hcl-sdk-tools
